trackerControl.title: Overview
trackerControl.text: Monitor below all the tracking done on your smartphone applications. You can filter the results by selecting a time range, selecting certain apps in the dropdown, clicking on each graph, or using the table filters or search box.

messages.select-applications-hint: Select the applications you want to include in the visualisation

trackerControl.title: Vue d'ensemble
trackerControl.text: Surveillez ci-dessous tout le suivi effectué sur les applications de votre smartphone. Vous pouvez filtrer les résultats en sélectionnant une plage de temps, en choisissant certaines applications dans la liste déroulante, en cliquant sur chaque graphique, ou en utilisant les filtres du tableau ou le champ de recherche.

messages.select-applications-hint: Sélectionnez les applications que vous souhaitez inclure dans la visualisation.
messages.Amount of tracking over time: Quantité de suivi dans le temps
messages.Companies behind tracking: Les entreprises à l'origine du suivi

viewBlocks.title: Overview
viewBlocks.text: Monitor below all the tracking done on all participant smartphone applications. You can filter the results by selecting a time range or clicking on each graph.

viewBlocks.title: Data hoarding
viewBlocks.text: Your data is transferred from applications to third parties, but did you know that there is a whole economy behind this data transfer, and that many exchange data with each other?

viewBlocks.title: Data hoarding (All Categories)
viewBlocks.text: Your data is transferred from applications to third parties, but did you know that there is a whole economy behind this data transfer, and that many exchange data with each other?

viewBlocks.title: Data hoarding (All inbound)

viewBlocks.title: Data hoarding (All)
